mapper.select: SELECT cash_kind as cashKind, category_name as categoryName, cash_price as cashPrice, cash_place as cashPlace, cash_memo as cashMemo FROM cash WHERE cash_no = #{cashNo}

SELECT IFNULL (IFNULL((SELECT SUM(cash_price) FROM cash WHERE cash_date = #{cashDate} AND cash_kind = '수입' AND member_id = #{memberId}), 0) - IFNULL((SELECT SUM(cash_price) FROM cash WHERE cash_date = #{cashDate} AND cash_kind = '지출' AND member_id = #{memberId}), 0), 0) FROM dual

SELECT cash_no as cashNo, cash_kind as cashKind, category_name as categoryName, cash_price as cashPrice, cash_place as cashPlace, cash_memo as cashMemo FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_date = #{cashDate} ORDER BY cash_no ASC
